name: Cooking Story
description:
Dominate culinary from all around the world by playing our famous restaurant game Cooking Story ™ . Prepare, cook & serve delicious cuisine like a professional chef and become king of the kitchen as you grill, bake and cook your way to the top.

Features:
• Multiple delicious dishes to cook using hundreds best quality ingredients
• A huge choice of world famous cuisines and local recipes
• Various levels for you to challenge yourself
• Hundreds and hundreds of upgrading mode for your kitchen appliances, interior and amenities
• Top time-management game for training your brain and speed daily
• Master all difficulty levels to get free coins and hearts
• Go through service to earn BIG TIPS or work extra shifts to earn money for upgrades
• Equip your chef with treats for customers, non-stick pans, bonus time and MORE!

Are you ready to be a top-notch chef?


Privacy policy: https://softfun.net/policy
